title._content: Mrs. W.J. Gaynor, Ruth [Gaynor], Rufus [Gaynor], Helen [Gaynor], Cary Waldroth, Mrs. E. Mayer,, Mrs. Tilly Page, Dorothy Mayer  (LOC)

description._content: Bain News Service,, publisher. Mrs. W.J. Gaynor, Ruth [Gaynor], Rufus [Gaynor], Helen [Gaynor], Cary Waldroth, Mrs. E. Mayer,, Mrs. Tilly Page, Dorothy Mayer 1914 April 21 (date created or published later by Bain) 1 negative : glass ; 5 x 7 in. or smaller. Notes: Title and date from data provided by the Bain News Service on the negative. Photograph shows Mrs. William J. Gaynor, widow of New York City Mayor Gaynor (1849-1913) with her children Ruth, Helen and Rufus and others, returning from the wedding of her son Norman Gaynor to Betsey Page which took place on April 16, 1914. (Source: Flickr Commons project, 2011 and New York Times, April 16, 1914) Forms part of: George Grantham Bain Collection (Library of Congress). Format: Glass negatives. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print General information about the Bain Collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.ggbain Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ggbain.16065 Call Number: LC-B2- 3062-14

note._content: This woman appears to have been omitted from Bain's attempted identifications.
note.author: 70251312@N00
